resources.string: AutoSuggest will search in all languages. However, you can additionally specify a fallback language, to help the API in situations where the input is particularly messy.
The voice language request parameter is defaulted to "en". The language code provided is used to configure both the Speechmatics ASR, and the what3words AutoSuggest algorithm.
Comma separated lat/lng of point to focus on. Example value:51.521251,-0.203586
Confine results to a given country or comma separated list of countries. Example value: GB,US

Restrict AutoSuggest results to a circle, specified by lat,lng,kilometres, where kilometres in the radius of the circle. For convenience, longitude is allowed to wrap around 180 degrees. For example 181 is equivalent to -179.
Confine results to a bounding box specified using co-ordinates. Example value: 51.521,-0.343,52.6,2.3324

Restrict AutoSuggest results to a polygon, specified by a comma-separated list of lat,lng pairs. The polygon should be closed, i.e. the first element should be repeated as the last element; also the list should contain at least 4 entries. The API is currently limited to accepting up to 25 pairs.
Welcome to Autosuggest sample in Jetpack Compose
